item.title: Anatomy of this website
item.description: This post serves as a description of how this site is built and run. I will try and keep this up to date if any changes are made. The following is a rough guide to how I got this site up ğŸ‘. Hugo + Caddy = ğŸš€ This basic static site takes advantage of two pieces of technology, Hugo and Caddy. Hugo is a fast, easy to use, extensible static site generator.
